畡字的基本解释

畡
gāi
古同“垓”。

畡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gāi］
［《集韻》柯開切，平咍，見。］
(1)同“垓”。古天子所领九州之地。
(2)数名。参见“畡數”。

畡字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【田字部】　畡； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页761第20
【集韻】柯開切，音該。同垓。【鄭語】居九畡之田。【註】九畡九州之極也。

畡字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
畡字的起名意思

暂无。

畡
Basic explanation of words
畡
gāi
Gu Tong "Gai".
畡
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gāi］
["Jiyun" Ke Kaiqie, flat 咍, see. ]
(1) Same as "Gai". The land of Kyushu led by the ancient emperor.
(2) Several names. See "number of stubbles".
畡
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Tian Zi Department] 　畡; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 761 20
[Ji Yun] Ke Kaiqie, the sound should be. The same Gai. [Zheng Yu] It is the land of Jiu Diao. [Note] Jiuyu is also the extreme of Kyushu.
